001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Notations;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
017import java.util.Map;
018
019public class ModelVariance {
020
021    public static void main(String[] args) {
022        useNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport.RATIONAL_BIGINT, 25, 8, 9, 0);
023    }
024
025    private static <N extends Number> void useNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int count, double regularizationLog10, int m, long sleep) {
026        Plot weightsPlot = new Plot("Total Absolute Weights");
027        weightsPlot.getChart().setXAxisTitle("iteration");
028        weightsPlot.display();
029
030        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME");
031        mrePlot.getChart().setXAxisTitle("iteration");
032        mrePlot.display();
033
034        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Variance vs Regularization");
035        fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport).getEstimationFunction(), "Target");
036        fitPlot.setYRange(-2.0, 2.0);
037        fitPlot.display();
038
039        N lambda = typeSupport.one();
040        N e = typeSupport.valueOf(10);
041        for (int i = 0; i < regularizationLog10; i++) {
042            lambda = typeSupport.divide(lambda, e);
043        }
044        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
045            Threads.sleepSilently(sleep);
046
047            String name = "log10(" + Notations.LAMBDA + ") = -" + regularizationLog10;
048            System.out.println(i + ": " + name);
049            LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport);
050            ((L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<N>) regression.getOptimizer()).setLambda(lambda);
051            LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model = regression.fitComplexity(m);
052
053            fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Regularized Fit");
054            Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
055            mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME", new float[]{i}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
056            for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
057                mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{i}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
058            }
059            float totalWeights = 0.0f;
060            for (int p = 0; p < model.getParameterCount(); p++) {
061                totalWeights += typeSupport.absolute(model.getParameter(p)).floatValue();
062            }
063            weightsPlot.addToSeries("Total Weights", new float[]{i}, new float[]{totalWeights});
064            fitPlot.getChart().setTitle(name);
065            fitPlot.redraw();
066            mrePlot.redraw();
067            weightsPlot.redraw();
068        }
069    }
070
071    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
072        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
073        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
074        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator);
075    }
076
077    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
078        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
079        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
080        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(1000);
081        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
082        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
083        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, new L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<>(basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType()));
084    }
085
086}
